STATUS.md.summary: v0.2.0 packaged as .vsix. All components assumed working. CI and tests missing.

CONVENTIONS.md.summary: TypeScript strict, VS Code API rules, Three Laws, no em dashes, no direct main pushes.

quick_context: aahp-orchestrator v0.2.0: VS Code extension that injects AAHP context into Copilot and Claude Code. Packaged as .vsix but not published to Marketplace. CI pipeline runs compile + lint + tests on push/PR. 72 unit tests via Vitest covering aahp-reader, agent-spawner, session-monitor, statusbar, and security. Next: T-003 Marketplace publish.
